sections.heading: budget officer; review encumbrances; lapse
sections.text: At the end of each biennium, the state budget officer shall review all encumbrances established in the preceding biennium and take appropriate action to lapse those encumbrances which do not meet the provisions of sections 81-138.01 to 81-138.04.SourceLaws

81-138.04.State budget officer; review encumbrances; lapse.

At the end of each biennium, the state budget officer shall review all encumbrances established in the preceding biennium and take appropriate action to lapse those encumbrances which do not meet the provisions of sections 81-138.01 to 81-138.04.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 233, ยง 4;Laws 1986, LB 258, ยง 30.
